attributes.action: Change Legislation to make  Disabled   Parking Bays  adjacent  to  peoples  homes  enforceable  under the  Road  Traffic  Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change Legislation to make  Disabled   Parking Bays  adjacent  to  peoples'  homes  enforceable  under the  Road  Traffic  Act  so that  any  unauthorized parked vehicles can be dealt with.

A Disabled Parking Bay is outlined on the road with white lines and enables Disabled People to park near to their own house

1/ Allocate these Disabled Bays to those with Mobility needs who have substantial difficulty walking to their cars.
2/ Allocate a bay via Badge/ House Number so that bay is solely for use of person it is allocated to.

Residential Disabled Parking Bays are applied for and allocated
as they are required and needed.

As the law stands now, anyone displaying a blue badge can park in your bay for any length of time and you or anyone else cannot do anything about it!!!
